pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:0.3.eng: The chapter on offenses entailing confession

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:0.5.eng: The training rule on women who are breastfeeding

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.1.eng: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo pāyantiṃ vuṭṭhāpenti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.2.eng: the nuns gave the full admission to a woman who was breastfeeding.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.5.eng: “Give almsfood to the Venerable. She has a companion.”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.7.eng: “How can the nuns give the full admission to a woman who is breastfeeding?”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.8.pli: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.8.eng: The nuns heard the complaints of those people

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.9.pli: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.9.eng: and the nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.11.eng: “Is it true, monks, that nuns did this?”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.14.pli: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo pāyantiṃ vuṭṭhāpessanti.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.16.pli: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.16.eng: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.17.1.eng: ‘If a nun gives the full admission to a woman who is breastfeeding, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.4.eng: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.6.eng: she is a mother or a wet-nurse.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.9.pli: “Vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti gaṇaṃ vā ācariniṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati, sīmaṃ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.9.eng: If, intending to give the full admission, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a monastery zone, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.10.eng: After the motion, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.10.comm: The Pali just says dukkaṭa, without specifying that it is an āpatti, “an offense”. Yet elsewhere, such as at Bu Ss 10:2.65, the dukkaṭa is annulled if you commit the full offense of saṅghādisesa. The implication is that in these contexts dukkaṭa should be read as āpatti dukkaṭassa, “an offense of wrong conduct”.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.11.eng: After each of the first two announcements, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.12.eng: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.13.pli: Gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.13.eng: and the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.14.1.eng: If the woman is breastfeeding, and the nun perceives her as such, yet she gives her the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.15.eng: If the woman is breastfeeding, but the nun is unsure of it, yet she gives her the full admission, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.16.eng: If the woman is breastfeeding, but the nun does not perceive her as such, and she gives her the full admission, there is no offense.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.17.eng: If the woman is not breastfeeding, but the nun perceives her as such, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.18.eng: If the woman is not breastfeeding, but the nun is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.19.eng: If the woman is not breastfeeding, and the nun does not perceive her as such, there is no offense.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.21.eng: if she gives the full admission to a woman who is breastfeeding, but she does not perceive her as such;

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.22.eng: if she gives the full admission to a woman who is not breastfeeding, and she does not perceive her as such;

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.24.eng: if she is the first offender.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.25.eng: The second training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:0.3.eng: The chapter on offenses entailing confession

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:0.5.eng: The training rule on trainee nuns

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpenti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.2.eng: At that time the nuns were giving the full admission to trainee nuns who had not trained for two years in the six rules.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.3.pli: Tā bālā honti abyattā na jānanti kappiyaṃ vā akappiyaṃ vā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.3.eng: They were ignorant and incompetent, and did not know what was allowable and what was not.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.4.pli: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.4.eng: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.5.pli: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.5.eng: “How can nuns give the full admission to trainee nuns who haven’t trained for two years in the six rules?” …

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.6.pli: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.6.eng: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.9.pli: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpessanti.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.12.eng: he gave a teaching and addressed the monks:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.13.pli: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sikkhamānāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhāsammutiṃ dātuṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.13.eng: “Monks, approval is required for a trainee nun to train in the six rules for two years.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.13.comm: For the contextual meaning of the Pali, see Bi Pc 64:1.36.1.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.14.eng: And it should be given like this.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.15.pli: Tāya sikkhamānāya saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā bhikkhunīnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.15.eng: After approaching the Sangha of nuns, that trainee nun should arrange her upper robe over one shoulder and pay respect at the feet of the nuns. She should then squat on her heels, raise her joined palms, and say:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.16.eng: ‘Venerables, I, so-and-so, am a trainee nun under Venerable so-and-so.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.17.pli: Saṅghaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhāsammutiṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.17.eng: I ask the Sangha for approval to train for two years in the six rules.’

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.18.eng: And she should ask a second

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.20.eng: A competent and capable nun should then inform the Sangha:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.21.eng: ‘Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.22.pli: Ayaṃ itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya sikkhamānā saṅghaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhāsammutiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.22.eng: So-and-so, who is a trainee nun under Venerable so-and-so, is asking the Sangha for approval to train in the six rules for two years.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.23.pli: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ saṅgho itthannāmāya sikkhamānāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhāsammutiṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.23.eng: If the Sangha is ready, it should give approval to trainee nun so-and-so to train in the six rules for two years.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.25.eng: Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.26.pli: Ayaṃ itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya sikkhamānā saṅghaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhāsammutiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.26.eng: So-and-so, who is a trainee nun under Venerable so-and-so, is asking the Sangha for approval to train in the six rules for two years.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.27.pli: Saṅgho itthannāmāya sikkhamānāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhāsammutiṃ deti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.27.eng: The Sangha gives approval to trainee nun so-and-so to train in the six rules for two years.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.28.pli: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya sikkhamānāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhāsammutiyā dānaṃ, sā tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.28.eng: Any nun who approves of giving approval to trainee nun so-and-so to train in the six rules for two years should remain silent.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.29.eng: Any nun who doesn’t approve should speak up.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.30.pli: Dinnā saṅghena itthannāmāya sikkhamānāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhāsammuti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.30.eng: The Sangha has given approval to trainee nun so-and-so to train in the six rules for two years.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.31.pli: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.31.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.32.eng: That trainee nun should then be told to say this:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.33.pli: “pāṇātipātā veramaṇiṃ dve vassāni avītikkamma samādānaṃ samādiyāmi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.33.eng: ‘I undertake to abstain from killing living beings for two years without transgression.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.34.pli: Adinnādānā veramaṇiṃ dve vassāni avītikkamma samādānaṃ samādiyāmi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.34.eng: I undertake to abstain from stealing for two years without transgression.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.35.pli: Abrahmacariyā veramaṇiṃ dve vassāni avītikkamma samādānaṃ samādiyāmi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.35.eng: I undertake to abstain from sexual activity for two years without transgression.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.36.pli: Musāvādā veramaṇiṃ dve vassāni avītikkamma samādānaṃ samādiyāmi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.36.eng: I undertake to abstain from lying for two years without transgression.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.37.pli: Surāmerayamajjappamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇiṃ dve vassāni avītikkamma samādānaṃ samādiyāmi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.37.eng: I undertake to abstain from alcohol, which causes heedlessness, for two years without transgression.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.38.pli: Vikālabhojanā veramaṇiṃ dve vassāni avītikkamma samādānaṃ samādiyāmī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.38.eng: I undertake to abstain from eating at the wrong time for two years without transgression.’”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.39.pli: Atha kho bhagavā tā bhikkhuniyo anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.39.eng: Then, after rebuking those nuns in many ways, the Buddha spoke in dispraise of being difficult to support …

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.40.pli: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.40.eng: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.41.1.pli: “Yā pana bhikkhunī dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:1.41.1.eng: ‘If a nun gives the full admission to a trainee nun who has not trained in the six rules for two years, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:2.1.4.eng: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:2.1.8.pli: sikkhā vā na dinnā hoti, dinnā vā sikkhā kupitā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:2.1.8.eng: the training has not been given to her, or the training has been given to her, but she has failed in it.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:2.1.11.pli: “Vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti gaṇaṃ vā ācariniṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati, sīmaṃ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:2.1.11.eng: If, intending to give the full admission, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a monastery zone, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:2.1.12.eng: After the motion, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:2.1.12.comm: The Pali just says dukkaṭa, without specifying that it is an āpatti, “an offense”. Yet elsewhere, such as at Bu Ss 10:2.65, the dukkaṭa is annulled if you commit the full offense of saṅghādisesa. The implication is that in these contexts dukkaṭa should be read as āpatti dukkaṭassa, “an offense of wrong conduct”.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:2.1.13.eng: After each of the first two announcements, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:2.1.14.eng: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:2.1.15.pli: Gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:2.1.15.eng: and the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:2.2.1.eng: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, and she perceives it as such, and she gives the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:2.2.2.eng: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but she is unsure of it, and she gives the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:2.2.3.eng: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but she perceives it as illegitimate, and she gives the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:2.2.4.eng: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, but she perceives it as legitimate, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:2.2.5.eng: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:2.2.6.eng: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, and she perceives it as such, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:2.3.2.pli: dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpeti,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:2.3.2.eng: if she gives the full admission to a trainee nun who has trained in the six rules for two years;

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:2.3.4.eng: if she is the first offender.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc63:2.3.5.eng: The third training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:0.3.eng: The chapter on offenses entailing confession

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:0.5.eng: The second training rule on trainee nuns

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ saṅghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpenti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.2.eng: At that time the nuns were giving the full admission to trainee nuns who had trained in the six rules for two years, but who had not been approved by the Sangha.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.4.pli: “etha, sikkhamānā, imaṃ jānātha, imaṃ detha, imaṃ āharatha, iminā attho, imaṃ kappiyaṃ karothā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.4.eng: “Come, trainee nuns, find out about this,” “Give this,” “Bring this,” “There’s need for this,” or “Make this allowable.”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.6.eng: “Venerables, we’re not trainee nuns. We’re nuns.”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.7.pli: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.7.eng: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.8.pli: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ saṅghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.8.eng: “How can nuns give the full admission to trainee nuns who have trained for two years in the six rules, but who haven’t been approved by the Sangha?” …

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.9.pli: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ saṅghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.9.eng: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.12.pli: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ saṅghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpessanti.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.15.eng: he gave a teaching and addressed the monks:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.16.pli: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya sikkhamānāya vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ dātuṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.16.eng: “Monks, approval is required for the full admission of a trainee nun who has trained for two years in the six rules.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.17.eng: And it should be given like this.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.18.pli: Tāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya sikkhamānāya saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā bhikkhunīnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.18.eng: After approaching the Sangha of nuns, that trainee nun should arrange her upper robe over one shoulder and pay respect at the feet of the nuns. She should then squat on her heels, raise her joined palms, and say:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.19.pli: ‘ahaṃ, ayye, itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā sikkhamānā saṅghaṃ vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.19.eng: ‘Venerables, I, the trainee nun so-and-so, who has trained for two years in the six rules under Venerable so-and-so, ask the Sangha for approval to be fully admitted.’

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.20.eng: And she should ask a second

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.22.eng: A competent and capable nun should then inform the Sangha:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.23.eng: ‘Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.24.pli: Ayaṃ itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā sikkhamānā saṅghaṃ vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.24.eng: This trainee nun so-and-so, who has trained under Venerable so-and-so for two years in the six rules, is asking the Sangha for approval to be fully admitted.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.25.pli: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya sikkhamānāya vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.25.eng: If the Sangha is ready, it should give approval for the trainee nun so-and-so, who has trained for two years in the six rules, to be fully admitted.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.27.eng: Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.28.pli: Ayaṃ itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā sikkhamānā saṅghaṃ vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.28.eng: This trainee nun so-and-so, who has trained under Venerable so-and-so for two years in the six rules, is asking the Sangha for approval to be fully admitted.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.29.pli: Saṅgho itthannāmāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya sikkhamānāya vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ deti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.29.eng: The Sangha gives approval for the trainee nun so-and-so, who has trained for two years in the six rules, to be fully admitted.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.30.pli: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya sikkhamānāya vuṭṭhānasammutiyā dānaṃ, sā tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.30.eng: Any nun who approves of giving approval for the trainee nun so-and-so, who has trained for two years in the six rules, to be fully admitted should remain silent.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.31.eng: Any nun who doesn’t approve should speak up.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.32.pli: Dinnā saṅghena itthannāmāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya sikkhamānāya vuṭṭhānasammuti;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.32.eng: The Sangha has given approval for the trainee nun so-and-so, who has trained for two years in the six rules, to be fully admitted.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.33.pli: khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.33.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.34.pli: Atha kho bhagavā tā bhikkhuniyo anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.34.eng: Then, after rebuking those nuns in many ways, the Buddha spoke in dispraise of being difficult to support …

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.35.pli: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.35.eng: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.36.1.pli: “Yā pana bhikkhunī dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ saṅghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:1.36.1.eng: ‘If a nun gives the full admission to a trainee nun who has trained in the six rules for two years, but who has not been approved by the Sangha, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.4.eng: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.8.eng: who has trained in the six rules.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.10.pli: ñattidutiyena kammena vuṭṭhānasammuti na dinnā hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.10.eng: approval to be fully admitted has not been given though a legal procedure consisting of one motion and one announcement.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.13.pli: “Vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti gaṇaṃ vā ācariniṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati, sīmaṃ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.13.eng: If, intending to give the full admission, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a monastery zone, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.14.eng: After the motion, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.14.comm: The Pali just says dukkaṭa, without specifying that it is an āpatti, “an offense”. Yet elsewhere, such as at Bu Ss 10:2.65, the dukkaṭa is annulled if you commit the full offense of saṅghādisesa. The implication is that in these contexts dukkaṭa should be read as āpatti dukkaṭassa, “an offense of wrong conduct”.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.15.eng: After each of the first two announcements, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.16.eng: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.17.pli: Gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.17.eng: and the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.18.1.eng: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, and she perceives it as such, and she gives the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.19.eng: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but she is unsure of it, and she gives the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.20.eng: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but she perceives it as illegitimate, and she gives the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.21.eng: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, but she perceives it as legitimate, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.22.eng: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.23.eng: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, and she perceives it as such, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.25.pli: dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ saṅghena sammataṃ vuṭṭhāpeti,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.25.eng: if she gives the full admission to a trainee nun who has trained in the six rules for two years and who has been approved by the Sangha;

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.27.eng: if she is the first offender.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:2.28.eng: The fourth training rule is finished.
